Summary: The CW Suites has a great location close to John Wayne Airport, free internet, spacious rooms, great staff, and newly remodeled rooms. Breakfast with coffee, juices, milk, eggs, bacon, sausage, pancakes is included!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a good hotel, at a good price.  Clean and comfortable, large rooms.  Decent breakfast.  The downside maybe is it is really large, could be a lot of walking.  I can recommend this hotel to business travelers and families.  We used it for a one night stop between Disneyland

Summary Heading: Pleasant surprise in a great location
Summary: This hotel has a great combination of big hotel accommodations and small hotel feel. The staff members to a person were professional, friendly and helpful. The rooms are under renovation, and the outcome is on par with any corporate hotel around. The grounds are beautifully landscaped with a good sized pool and hot tub. They offer a simple hot make to order breakfast not just cereal and toast. I would stay there again in a heartbeat.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to comment about your stay at the CW Suites. We are delight to see that you enjoyed your stay. Thanks again and we hope to see you soon.

Summary: Overall it was good, the only thing I didn't like was the smell of the room, the room had a musty smell to it so I went to buy a room spray to eliminate the smell. Breakfast was good can't complain when it's freshly made. I would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: hank you for taking time out of your busy day to write a review of the CW Suites John Wayne Airport. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay and the cooked to order breakfast. Thank you for staying with us and hope to see you in the near future. Again, thank you for writing a review.

Summary: I booked through booking.com and used the filters, free parking, free wifi, swimming pool, breakfast and fitness room. This hotel had it all.  Rooms were amazing size and clean.  Good air conditioning.   Breakfast was made to order and you could sit by the pool.  Close to Newport Beach and John Wayne airport. Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank for commenting about your stay. We are pleased to see that you enjoyed the breakfast, WIFI, swimming pool, and fitness room . Once again, thank you for commenting about your stay and we hope to see you soon.

Summary: I always take some time to brows  between the buildings of this hotel and smell the roses, literary! It's hard to find another hotel in this price range with this abundance of roses and other plants on the grounds. Though, my husband likes CW's breakfast more than flowers - it's a full meal made to order (eggs, sausage, pancakes) plus fruits, yogurt and choice of cereal. It's served with a smile in a nice room with TV and newspapers.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review of our hotel. We really appreciate your positive comments concerning our amenities, landscape, and breakfast. These are all critical components to a positive guest experience. We hope to see you again soon, and want you to know that we truly value your business.

Summary: I was there over Labor Day weekend for a small convention. I found myself going up and down stairs far more often than my bad knee wanted, because the elevator was inconvenient at least 2/3 of the time. The bed was hard, pillows small and uncomfortable. It's a good thing I didn't care about watching TV, because it seemed like I could only get CNN, and couldn't make the channel guide work. There are remodeling the lobby, and apparently the rooms. I caught a glimpse of one with wood floors and a large tub that overlooked the pool. My friend was told they had no disabled rooms. The breakfast was barely tolerable, so I should have gone out after the first morning. The landscaping needs a total overhaul, especially by the pool where palm trees are in the middle of the pathways

Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you provided to better our hotel for future guests.  I hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you with a superior experience.

Summary: The price changed and they would not honor the price I booked it for. They changed their story mid sentence about how they don't honor third party websites prices, as I had booked on trip advisor, and that trip advisor had charged me already then they needed my card and billed it.   I showed them the trip advisor website and how it still listed the lower price for booking. They said that they were aware of it. I then asked if I could cancel and go across the street as it was a lower price. They said yes but they would then be allowed to charge me the rate I had accepted on the Internet!  So my choice was to stay and pay a higher rate or leave and pay the rate was quoted!   The next morning at check out I explained it and showed the screen shots to the desk clerk and asked that

Summary: One of the worst hotels I've ever stayed at!!  There was ants in my room, I called front desk, no one came or responded (I was there for 2 nights).  I had booked 9 rooms, the entire grouper the to the pool, there were no towels, I went to the front desk to ask them for towels, he said we only have 2 towels right now!!  And never brought any.  Last day, my sister was standing in line for breakfast, she was the last one in line, breakfast ends at 9:30am, she was standing there for about 20 min, the server closes the door in front of her at 9:32 saying breakfast is over!!! Is this for real?? Who hired these people.  Throughout the weekend I went to complain to the front desk, they told Me the manager returns on Tuesday!!   Don't stay at this hotel, bad service and not so pleasant

Allow me to apologize on behalf of our hotel for failing to meet your expectations on your recent visit. We sincerely appreciate it and hope that you will give us another chance to provide you with superior service and accommodations on your next visit into the Santa Ana area.

Summary: The hotel room itself was average.  Having a suite is nice as it comes with more room, mini fridge and microwave and two TVs.  The quality of the room is decent.    The reservation was done with a special rate via Tripadvisor and their computer system did not transfer the # of guests correctly to the hotel computer system. So the room was not properly prepared for the # of guests -- and they didn't want to give us enough breakfast coupons.  I had to complain enough to get them to give me more breakfast coupons.    The front desk people did the job but were not that friendly or engaging.  They were there because they needed a job -- they were not welcoming or eager to please.   The parking at this hotel is VERY VERY tight.  And that alone will likely keep me from staying there
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to comment about your stay and bring these issues to our attention.  I apologize for the service that you were provided and the parking issue.  We will definitely take steps correct these issues that you have informed use about.  Once again thank you for taking the time to comment about your stay.

Summary: I was there for 5 days in July. Nice pace, great pool and spa although it was closed a couple times. They are renovating the motel so there were a lot of people around bringing in furniture and other materials. It seemed half the building was under renovation but what I did see them doing looking nice. The rooms are spacious and the housekeepers do a good job.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to comment about your stay at the CW Suites.  We are delight to see that you enjoyed your stay.  We do apologize for the current renovations that our hotel is undergoing.  Our renovation process should be done shortly; hopefully you will make a trip to this area to see our newly remodeled hotel. Thanks again and we hope to see you soon.

Summary: Was in town for a family gathering and found this hotel with great prices and did not know what to expect.  Friendly service from front desk, housekeeping and shuttle driver. Rooms were clean and split into a bedroom and sitting room, both with flat screen TVs.  This is an older hotel but it is kept super clean and neat.  The gardens are beautiful with plenty of humming birds (I think that is what they were), trees and flowering bushes.  Lots of guests were taking pictures of the gardens.  The only negatives were the fones (static), and the TV choices.  I would recommend this hotel to friends and I would not hesitate to stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to comment about your stay.  We are happy to see that you were delighted with our staff and service that we provided you.  We are undergoing a renovation process to upgrade our hotel and apologize for the inconvenience this may have caused.  Once again, thank you for staying and we hope to see you in the near future.

Summary: This hotel is under going renovation. I really liked the agents that checked me in. They were very friendly and were eager to assist me in locating restaurants and nearby shopping. The hotel grounds are very lush with nice seating areas scattered about the property. The room I had was large and had a separate living room with an additional TV. The couch was not very comfortable though. The room had a microwave, small fridge and a coffee maker. The bed was comfortable but it comes with four tiny pillows. I've never seen ones this size before. The room was clean, nice decor.  When I entered the room it was very hot. It cooled down after I turned on the a/c unit. It took a while for it to cool the sleeping area.  There is a small fitness room with decent equipment but the a/c
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to write a review of your stay with the CW Suites.  We pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay and that our front desk agents were eager to assist you in the locations of local restaurants.  We do apologize for the A/C units not cooling the rooms as quickly as you would like.  We are looking into keeping the A/C units on during the hotter days so guest can have a more comfortable stay when they enter the room.  Once again, thank you for commenting and we hope that you stay with us in the near future.

Summary: This place is currently under renovation and still looks good. Staff is polite and helpful, pool and spa look crystal clear most rooms surround the poo so there's a nice view. This room has an entertainment room with coffee and tea maker, AC unit, flat screen tv, then comes the bedroom which has another flat screen tv, a built in sink, mirrored closet with a safe. There is a fridge and microwave. There is a full bathroom and the shower head it high! Yay! In the back is a small balcony. Very nice!

Summary Heading: Should I stay or should I go now? Cranky front desk

The online reviews put my mind at ease, that this would be another great place to stay at the end of a great day. Unfortunately, my experience was contrary to that of most reviews immediately after I showed up at the front desk.  The smug gentleman, perched behind the counter, seemed amused by the fact I came with cash to pay for the room. He insisted I go to the chase bank down the road 9 miles, take a left, go down the alley between auto zone and the Irvine edd office, turn right and I should see chase building. Summary: This hotel is under new ownership/management but a lot of the same people still work here. Previously it was the Quality Inn & Suites.   RESERVATIONS: We called the hotel to get a 7 night rate and they quoted us a rate that I thought was a little high so I went to the website and got a much cheaper rate for the same 7 nights. I would definitely checkout the rates on the website as well.   CHECK IN: was fast and friendly. They add a $1.50 per night charge for the use of a safe so make sure you decline that right up front if you’re not going to use the safe. You must use a credit or debit card to check in. Summary Heading: Fantastic place to stay for business or vacation
Summary: I stayed at this hotel with friends for a weekend trip from Los Angeles and I would highly recommend this hotel for any travel needs in Orange County. The hotel is very conveniently located to the freeway, as well as shopping (South Coast Plaza, The Lab, etc.), beaches (Huntington Beach, Newport Beach), Disneyland, the OC Fairgrounds, and restaurants.   The hotel itself included free wifi, two free water bottles in the room, free breakfast in the morning, a pool, and a gym. The lobby is beautiful and the room we stayed in was very clean and provided everything I needed. Each room is a suite, including a bed and a pull out couch. There's also a small gift shop in the lobby that will have any last minute things you may have forgotten. Additionally, the staff are all incredibly

Summary: I booked this hotel on line for two nights after reading some of the reviews. After we checked in and got to our room, I thought I was at a different hotel. The carpet had so many stains and the odor inside the room was awful. My wife and I went back to the front desk and asked for another room. We were given another room directly below the first one. This room was no better. In fact this one not only came with stained carpet and a musty smell but it also had ants in the bathroom.   We spent the next hour on the phone trying to find another hotel in the area for the night but everything was booked. We did find another hotel for our second night and cancelled the one at CW suites. The pool was also closed during our one day stay, A sign said it was closed for cleaning but it was

Once again, thank you for taking time to comment about your stay.

Summary: I have stay in CW suites for 4 night on a business trip.  The hotel is in a good location.   It is near freeway and several shopping area.  Plenty of restaurant nearby.   Room is clean and the bed is very comfortable.    The staff is friendly and helpful.   The order to go breakfast is excellent.  I had breakfast in the courtyard which is very pleasant.    The hotel is 15 min easy drive to downtown disney.  It is pretty fun to visit the area.  The hotel is under renovation and it will be even nicer after the completion.    I enjoy my stay and will stay here again if I come back next time.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to write about your stay at the CW Suites.  We are delighted to see that had the opportunity to enjoy the amenities such as the cook to order breakfast.  Again, thank you for writing a review of your stay and hopefully on your next trip you will be able to stay in a new renovated room.

Summary: Old, tired hotel with lousy service. Clerk at front desk did not even know the correct location of the laundry.  Room walls are paper thin, so you can hear your neighbor. I had to call the front desk at 3 and 3:30AM, as the people above where making all kind of racket. Clerk said he sent security but could not hear anything. Well, I guess my wife and I are just crazy. They tried to charge us $5.50 Per day for using the room safe. After complaing, the clerk waived the charge. I've never heard of a hotel charging for using the room safe. Flat screen TV but no HD picture and less than basic cable. Not enough electrical outlets. Computer in lobby not working during  our 3 night stay. Unable to print boarding passes.

Summary Heading: Excellent! Breakfast, Clean, Value, Hospitality, Convenience, Good for family stay.
Summary: Breakfast - excellent cook to order. Clean - fresh and clean room, facility. Value - Great value with all the excellence. Hospitality - Friendly stuff, especially in the breakfast serving. Convenience - close to food, activities in Irvine. Good for family stay - spacious room for family to stay. Good for business stay.

Summary: The hotel is in a great location for our vacation.  It is located 10-15 minutes easy drive to Disneyland and it's in a safe and quiet area.   I prefer its location than those hotels right next to Disneyland which are crowed and noisy.     There are shopping mall, movie theater and lots of restaurant nearby including in-n-out burger :)     The room is spacious and clean.   Front desk is friendly and helpful for questions.   The landscape is pretty.   The cook to order breakfast looks very good.   Too bad we did not have chance to try since the kids wants to go to Disneyland first thing in the morning.    We will stay here again if we visit the area next time.

Summary: Good place to stay for the price.  We booked on short notice, and the room was nice, clean and it worked out well.  Only con was parking, there was a large section blocked off for construction and neighboring businesses had trucks parked in the lot which took up a lot of space.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to write a review of your stay.  We are happy to see that our accommodations met your needs.  We do apologize for the inconvenience for the parking. We are going through a renovation process to upgrade our property and this should be finished shortly.  Once again thank you for taking time to write a review. We hope to see you in the near future

Summary: Although the hotel was being renovated, it did not affect our time on the property. The grounds are very nice with a tropical feel. Our suite was very large; perfect for families. They also offer cooked-to-order breakfast, which was so much better than continental type breakfast. The hotel is within all big Orange County attractions, without needing to get on the freeway.

Summary Heading: Excellent meeting space and wonderful staff
Summary: We had a high school group of 60, with adult chaperons, stay at this hotel.  The management and night staff were so helpful and easy to work with.  The breakfasts were delicious!  Clean rooms, comfortable beds, and big enough to fit 3 in their own bed in each room.  I would come back with my family - the price is reasonable, especially for the quality of accomadations!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to comment about your stay with the CW Suites John Wayne Airport.  We are delighted that you and your group were satisfied with all of our services and amenities that we offered.  Thank you again for taking time to comment about your stay any we hope to see you in the near future.

Summary: Good location. OK room. I've stayed here twice. The first room was dark and depressing. The second a more comfortable and light. Made to order breakfast was good and filling. The pool area was nice, but the pool was a "mini" pool that went to 5 feet at the deepest, therefore no jumping or diving, which matters to the kids. It is close to a shopping center with Whole Foods, AMC, Target, etc. if you need to pick something up or want to get out of the heat for a movie.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your busy day to write a review of the CW Suites John Wayne Airport. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay and the surrounding area. Thank you for staying with us and hope to see you in the near future. Again, thank you for writing a review.

Summary Heading: Great value, great service, nice people!
Summary: The location of the hotel is great, very close to the freeway and to the Orange County Airport. The facility is clean and nice little details in the landscaping and decoration make it feel nice. The hot freshly cooked breakfast is great, the ladies working there are phenomenal, although super busy, very very fast and always with a smile on the face. Plus there is a free 24 hr a day coffee tea corner!  Pool and spa is small but nice as well. Many places to eat in nearby Tustin area plus a restaurant at walking distance to the hotel.   The only down side is the sound insulation is poor so there is ambient noise from the nearby freeway and airport, but overall is a great place to stay. Would definetly recommend it!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to write a review of the CW Suites John Wayne Airport. We are pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay and were able to enjoy or cooked to order breakfast along with the other amenities that are offered at our hotel. Again, thank you for writing a review.

Summary: I'd never stayed at CW Inn and Suites before, but will likely choose this place again.  Great shuttle service (call and they come) and a nice breakfast with both made to order and grab and go choices. My room was clean and comfortable.   My only gripe was that when I arrived a gentleman was checking in who really wanted a little milk for his tea.  Since this place serves breakfast, the staff could easily have helped him and given him a small carton of milk (he offered to pay).  Instead they told him to walk a 1/4 mile to a gas station "that might sell milk".  come on - go above the basic and you get 5 stars.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to comment about your stay at the CW Suites John Wayne Airport.  We are delighted to see that you were able to experience our cook to order breakfast.  We are also please to see that you were able to use free shuttle service to the John Wayne Airport.  Once again, thank you for taking time to comment about your stay.

Summary: Acceptable hotel in a great location.  Close to John Wayne SNA airport.    Rooms are dated and becoming somewhat shabby.  The door into our room was beat up, and needed paint.  Not enough electrical outlets to charge all our devices, without unplugging something.  However, the bed was very comfortable, and nice amenities were available.  Satellite TV has lots of good channels, including major ESPN channels, and the Weather Channel.  Breakfast is wonderful.  Unlike most “breakfast included” places, this was cooked to order.  Eggs prepared almost anyway, hash browns, bacon or sausage, hotcakes, etc.
Manager Response: We sincerely appreciate you taking time to review our hotel.   I am so glad to hear that our accommodations met your expectations during your recent stay and you were able to enjoy our full cook to order breakfast.   Thank you for your review, we hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: A fireplace was advertised in the king suite but we were not allowed to turn it on, the tub had a hair, breakfast was a little overcooked, and someone was smoking outside our room even though the whole campus was promoted as smoke free. Besides that, it was a nice hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to comment about your stay.   We do apologize for not meeting your expectations. Hopefully, we get an opportunity to make your business stay a more pleasant one during your next visit.  Once again, thank you for taking time to comment about your stay.

Summary: We had an early flight from John Wayne so decided to stay the night here and take advantage of the free shuttle offered on the website rather than use the train early from nearby Riverside County. When we arrived at around 5 PM, the desk was manned by one young lady who was fielding phones ringing non- stop, guest check-in and a small convenience type counter for beverages, sundries etc. We waited patiently for about 15 minutes for our keys and asked about the first shuttle. She told us 6 AM, then hourly. To make our flight, we needed to leave at 6. We then asked about the included breakfast. So it was either make the flight or breakfast.   At 5:45 AM we arrived back at the desk to make the shuttle. The morning clerk said no one had noted on their schedule that we needed a ride
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to bring your concerns regarding stay to our attention. We value your patronage and certainly want to know if you are dissatisfied in any way.  Please accept our sincere apologies for any inconvenience you experienced during your stay. We strive for perfection in our hotel rooms and service, and the comfort of our guests is a top priority.  I would like to assure you that the concerns you've raised have been addressed, and the appropriate action has been taken.

Summary Heading: Superb accomodations at much lower price
Summary: The hotel's price was much lower than those nearby, but the accommodations were impeccable, clean, roomy, and the staff was extremely helpful.  My airline canceled  my flight on which I was to arrive the first night, and even though my call was shortly after 7:30 pm, they did not charge me.  I would gladly stay there again, and recommend it to others.

Summary: Excellent breakfast, Eggs (any style including omelets), sausage, bacon, hash-browns. fresh pastries, Cooked as you wait.  Very comfortable rooms with separated living and sleeping areas, Clean well kept, excellent friendly staff, Nice pool and hot tub.  The best I have stayed in for the price.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to comment about your stay at the CW Suites.  We are delighted to see that you enjoyed our breakfast, rooms, and all the amenities that our property has to offer.  Once again, thank you for taking time to comment about your stay and we hope to see you soon.

Summary: We stayed for two nights and were happy with the room. The free wifi, microwave, and mini-fridge were great perks, especially since many higher-priced hotels only offer those with additional fees. The layout of the bathroom is tight - the door barely cleared the toilet so it's a bit of a squeeze.   The made-to-order breakfast was great. You can choose from eggs, pancakes, sausage, bacon, etc. There's also pastries, fruit, and cereal for those who don't have a hot breakfast voucher.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your busy day to comment about your stay at the Quality Suites John Wayne Airport. Summary Heading: If you like ants, stay here
Summary: DO NOT STAY HERE GO SOMEWHERE ELSE!! I checked in after my reservation at another hotel got messed up and they informed me that AC was not working so I decided to come here. What a let down. My first room 327 was very sub-par motel feeling and was infested with ants...not regular red ants but huge blank ants with wings. I was then offered an "upgrade" 367 which seemed like a basic standard room and again the ants appeared. The room did not have much to offer. The manager Rigo said he would honor 50% off after moving us rooms, which was very kind. On the 3rd day however the ants came back and we were exhausted from traveling from the east coast and then changing hotels twice and then rooms twice after that so decided to deal with an ant or 2. But then there was more. Management
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: OK motel and close to the airport
Summary: This place is now called The CW Suites motel as it has terminated it's relationship with Quality Inns, according to the desk clerk.   Have stayed at better motels but given the number of options along Hotel Terrace Way, their price is reasonable and they have a full hot breakfast which is made to order and very tasty.  The location is close to the airport and the motel is clean. I don't care for the room arrangement as the bed is right next to the air conditioner and it blows on you if it is on, and also the wash basin is separate from the bath/stool shower area and if someone is getting ready for bed or getting up, they will have the lights on and will keep you awake if you are in bed.  Poor design and setup.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to comment about your stay. We very much appreciate and value your feedback and will share it with our team. Your comment will serve as encouragement to all of our staff as we strive to continuously improve the quality of our services to provide an exceptional experience for our guests. It is always a pleasure to receive feedback.

Summary: My last stay, during the peak summer tourist season wasn't that great because of the noise. Now that all the adults are back in school, the place was much more quiet and peaceful thankfully. I enjoyed the breakfast that much more and the room was decent, but I still prefer the LQ next door (for another post). Overall, not bad and decent especially when it is actually quiet.

Thank you so much for your business and we look forward to seeing you in the future

Summary: The Hotel Terrace area has 6 or 7 hotels.  This one was a pretty reasonably priced choice.  Suite might not be the right term to describe the room.  There is a living room area with it's own tv but there is only a half wall separating it from the bedroom.  Room also had a microwave and mini fridge.  Breakfast was very good.  Cook to order with a choice of omelets and other eggs, pancakes, hash browns, etc.  Portions are not large but hot and pretty good.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to comment about you stays at the CW Suites.  We are delighted to see that you were able to enjoy our cook to order breakfast and the other amenities that we offer. Summary: Easy access to airport & highways.  Made to order breakfast was very nice.  We were on the bottom floor & it was a bit noisy especially once the housekeeping crews came as we were close to their area (room 115) plus traffic from the near by road.  Good restaurant/bar within walking distance.  Check in & Check out was great.

We are happy to see that you enjoyed all of our amenities and the great service that was provided by our staff. I will definitely share your review with our staff. Once again, thank you for taking time to write a review and we hope to see you in the near future.

Summary: This hotel is more than value for money and offers everything you need from Laundry, Gym, Pool with clean rooms that offer a more than comfortable stay. My only disappointment is we did not stay long enough.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to comment. We would also like to thank you for your kind words. We are delighted to hear that you enjoy staying with us. We enjoy having you! We look forward to seeing you on your next trip In Orange County.

Summary: We had a two-queen suite facing the pool area. There are numerous hotels in this area; here is what stood out for us:  large rooms, including an extra TV/sofa room with partial room divider.  Not only was the extra space a bonus, but the outside corridor and air conditioner noises were blocked from the bed area.  The bathroom sink was outside the bathroom - much better for sharing the space.  Pool and hot tub exceptionally clean.  Breakfast A+, cooked to order and fast!  Those gals cooking were impressive.  And finally, our pick-up to and from the airport was courteous and timely.  Overall, a very, very good experience and great value!

The room is beautiful and very well maintained. The room was equpped with everything we need, coffer maker, referigerator, micro, hair dryer, and iron. The list goes on and on. The two room suite with a pocket door that separates the living room and the bed room worked perfect for our family. The bed in the bedroom is very comfortable. However, the sleeper sofa in the living room is not.  I guessed they were all like that. The hotel grounds is beautiful. It looked a lot like a resort setting. The breakfast is great with many choices. For a family of four,  the free breakfast saved us a lot of money. This hotel has everything we need at
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your views about your stay at the Quality Suites John Wayne Airport.  We are delighted to see that all of our amenities met yours and your family’s needs.  Once again, thank you for taking time to comment about your stay and we hope to see you soon.

Summary: Hotel was great. Room was clean and nice. breakfast was very good and fast service. I was informed by the front desk at check in to be at the breakfast room before 7:30  to avoid long wait when the hotel was full. I also saw a poster in the elevator to advise guests be early to avoid wait. I thought that was very nice. Convenient to malls and attractions. I will definitely stay here again and will recommend this hotel to all my friends and co-workers.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to comment about your stay at the Quality Suites John Wayne Airport.  We are delighted to see that you enjoyed your stay and that all our amenities and services met your needs.  Once again, thank you for taking time to comment about your stay and we hope to see you in the future.

Summary: Nice suites- larger than I was expecting. Walls adequately insulated from noise. Well appointed with only a couple of minor annoyances (no disabled parking in front, and parking is barely adequate if hotel is full particularly if some wealthy car owners take up two parking places instead of one!- only disabled parking is in the rear). Breakfast was very good- I usually go to Church's Coffee shop/restaurant in Costa Mesa/Newport Beach for breakfast when I'm in town- but the breakfast at this Quality Inn & Suites is a very good substitute (plus it's in the hotel). Room was clean, maids polite. Desk clerk was always polite, even when trying to handle both the gift shop and front desk at the same time.   I booked reservations through Choicehotels.com directly. I was very comfortable
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to comment about your stay at the Quality Suites John Wayne Airport.  We are pleased to see that our staff and amenities met your needs.  I do apologize for any inconvenience due to the parking situation.  Once again, thank you for taking time to comment about your stay and we hope to see you in the future.

Summary: Overall the hotel was an ok value. Room dated but clean, quiet and roomy, no pay movie options, weird ventilation system (bedroom cold, living room warm). The "included" breakfast was a joke. Get there by 730 or wait in line for 45 minutes for your turn. Just do a buffet and get people in and out. Nothing amazing about scrambled eggs, bacon and the usual, not worth waiting in line outside for almost an hour.  The best part was when I asked "Julie" at the front desk if I could skip the breakfast and lower my room rate and avoid the torture of waiting 45 minutes for bad breakfast, she just said it's included and didn't say another word, literally, except a half hearted thanks when she handed me the bill. Maybe a symptom of being treated like garbage by management? Or she's just
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time out of your day to comment about your stay.  I do apologize for any inconvenience you had with the breakfast during your stay.  Unfortunately, on occasion the breakfast room may be a little busier than normal due to the hotel having large groups or a high occupancy.  During these times we have a separate breakfast room for these groups to eat buffet style and additional cooks to help the line move faster for guests that are not part of the groups.  Also, we do have signs posted in the elevators and in the guest service directory in the room advising guests to arrive to the breakfast room early to avoid a long wait.  We, also, inform our guest during the check in process to be at the breakfast room before 7:30am to avoid a wait when the hotel is full.  Once again, thank you for taking time to comment about your stay.

Summary Heading: It's  ok but a few issues
Summary: This hotel is clean, and has nice rooms especially for families and for extended stays. I have to agree with CMNT24 on two things: First, we also made a request online and this showed on the confirmation. It was a rollaway, but when we checked in not only the receptionist didn't know about this request, but it turns out the hotel does not have any at all. I think if you request something and this is not offered at all at the hotel it would be nice to get an email letting you know that whatever it is you need is not available so you are prepared, and like CMNT24 says, there is a disconnect because the receptionist do not see those requests at all.  Second, the breakfast is a nightmare, you have to stand in line for about 30 minutes before getting it, they really need to change
Manager Response: none

Summary: I have stayed here twice this year, first in March and then again in July.   My first experience was fabulous.  Because of some mobility issues, I always request a room near an elevator.  In March, my requests were met.  Having stayed here before, this time I also requested a room on the top floor which I found to be very quiet last time.  When I arrived last week, I was given a room that was not on the top floor and not near an elevator.  I booked on-line, and it does say that requests will not be seen until the day of arrival.  However, I did expect the request to be seen at some point.  The young man at the front desk could not find my reservation, even with the confirmation sheet...and then told me my requests were not there, even though I had the print-out with them clearly
Manager Response: Dear Brerm,  Thank you for taking time to comment about the Quality Suites John Wayne Airport.  We are pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay.  At the Quality Suites John Wayne Airport strive to provide the best service possible.  Once again, thank you for taking time comment about your stay and hope to see you in the near future.

Summary Heading: No doubt a top notch hotel with awesome staff
Summary: I travel a lot for business. This summer I have to visit Irvine, ca., 3 to 4 times a month. I found this hotel from a co-worker. I am so glad I did. Not only the price is right, the room condition is excellent and it is super clean. The grounds and pool area are so beautiful that make me feel total relaxed after hard working day. I can tell the hotel staff have worked very hard to take good care of every details of the room condition and provide excellent guest service. I don't eat the breakfast every day though the breakfast is a cooked to order style and the cook is always smile and cheerful. By the way, I love their bed, it is so comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to write a review about your stay at the Quality Suites John Wayne Airport.  We are happy to see that you enjoyed your stay and are delighted that you took the time out of your day to comment about your stay.  Once again, thank you for staying and hope to see you in the future.

Summary: We stayed at this place while en route to San Diego. the room wasn't in very good condition -- the AC wasn't working and bathroom's door knob was broken. However, it seemed like the staff would have taken care of if I had stayed there for more than a night (I noticed the AC problem in the middle of the night). The breakfast was ok... though not-so-good for a vegetarian. Other than that, the room was clean and the staff was helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Places2GoB4Idie,  Thank you for commenting about your stay about the Quality Suites John Wayne Airport.  I have spoken with the Chief Engineer and stated how extremely important it is that the air conditioners and bathroom door are working properly.  I do apologize for any inconvenience that this may have caused.  Once again thank you for taking time to comment about your stay.

Summary: We visited Disneyland and California Adventure for 3 days. Instead of staying at a hotel near the park, we decided to try this one which is about 15 minutes drive from Disney.  We are very glad we chose Quality Suites. The hotel guest room is very nice. Clean and spacious suites with all the amenities we needed.  Everything worked in the room. We were specially impressed with the the bed that is SO comfortable. We enjoyed the quietness of this hotel. Our kids loved the beautiful pool area and spent a couple of hours in the pool without hectic.  During our stay, we missed the first day breakfast. The second day we arrived at the breakfast room at 7:30 AM, the lady cook was very nice.The cooked to order breakfast was great. Again, no waiting in line. The staff from the front desk
Manager Response: Dear  Wandalovetravel,  Thank you for commenting about your stay at the Quality Suites John Wayne Airport.  We are happy to see that all of our accommodations and staff members met yours and your family’s needs.  Once again, thank you for taking time to comment about your stay and we hope to see you in the near the future.

Summary Heading: Remains a great place to stay
Summary: Over the past 3 years, my wife and I have stayed at this Quality Suite several times while visiting family in the area..last in December of 2010. On prior visits, and again on this most recent stay, we were impressed with the overall cleanliness of the room, corridors, elevator,lobby,etc. The cleaning/maid staff deserves a big hand! The grounds were likewise beautiful and well manicured. Although this is an older motel, the owners have done an excellent job of renovation in every respect. The 2 room suite is spacious,QUIET and beds comfortable. The breakfast was flavorful and promply made to order. Overall, our stays have been very pleasurable! At the time of our last stay, we were a bit disappointed that there was no free business center computer in the lobby..although free
Manager Response: Dear CWWTuscon,  Thank you for taking time to comment about your stay at the Quality Suites John Wayne Airport.  We are delighted to see that that you enjoyed your stay.  We always strive to provide guests a great experience when staying at the Quality Suites John Wayne Airport.  Once again, thank you for taking time to comment about your stay and we hope to see you in the near future.

Summary: I found this hotel of equal quality to those charging much more only a few miles away, making this choice well worth it. Very nice, clean and functioning suite with microwave and refrigerator that are perfect for a traveller away from  home for a couple of weeks. The bed is very comfortable and the internet is very fast and easy to use. The service is good. All the staff are very pleasant and helpful.  I stayed at this hotel for 10 days and was very happy.
Manager Response: Dear Hornsch,  Thank you for taking time to write about your stay at the Quality Suites John Wayne Airport.  We are delighted when a guest comments about their stay.  I am pleased to see the staff was helpful and our accommodations met your needs.  Once again, thank for taking time out of your busy day to comment about your stay and hope to see you soon.

Summary: I travelled to southern california several times a month and always stay at this motel. The location is close to every thing. The room is clean and comfortable. The staff is wonderful. The free breakfast is great.  The internet is servicable. This is not a 5 star hotel though, It is the value and service that keep me coming back again and again.
Manager Response: Dear Ssaalvma, Thank you for taking time to comment about your stay at the Quality Suites John Wayne Airport.  We are happy when guests take time out of their day to comment about the hotel.  We are pleased that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you in the near future.  Once again, thank you for commenting about your stay.

Summary: I have no idea how idea this hotel got to be #4. Yes, it's close to the airport. Yes, it has a wonderful breakfast and I think her name was Celia (the cook) should be recognized for her hard work. However, remodel? There was dark green carpet, old wood, old TVs, what looked like water damage or mold on the wallpaper in the bathroom. A drop ceiling in bathroom. The room was dark, dingy, there was a bug in the bathroom and worst of all the SMELL!  The room was so musty, dirty smelling that we slept on top the blankets in our clothes and left at first light. It was like an old basement!  We stayed in rm 136.  I read a previous review from Jan and another traveler had the same experience and the hotel's response dismissed that review as not having received a complaint. Well we
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for writing a review about your recent stay at Quality Suites. I am very sorry that you were disappointed at our hotel. We do care very much about our guest experience, so as the General Manager, I went into room 136 to inspect the room in person. This room does not have smell as you described. This guest room was competely rennovated in 2008 summer with brand new furnitures, sleeper sofa, mattress/bedding, carpet, wall paper, drapes/sheer, light fixture, toilet, plumbing fixtures and bath tub. We also recently changed all the bedding including all the pillows and sheets. In the living room, the TV has a 27" Phillip flat screen TV puchased in 2008 and the bedroom has an older CRT 27" TV purchased in 2004. The bathroom wall paper does not have water damage or mold as you described. The bath room has a drop ceiling and I am very sorry it bothers you. After room rennovation, our maintenance staff and housekeepers continuously work hard to maintain all the room condition as best as they possibly can. I wish you had notified us about your disatisfaction with the room condition at first time. So we would have an opportunty to switch you to another room that you will be happy with. Your assumption that all the rooms are as bad as room 136 (based on your standard) is really not true. Again, I want to thank you for using Quality Suites and I am very sorry you were disappointed at our hotel.

Summary: A very well kept hotel with all the perks of an expensive hotel at a little price. Nice, clean and comfortable room. The complimentary breakfast is more than just regular buffet. The staff from the front desk clerks to housekeepers are all friendly and helpful. Very fast, I mean very fast internet access at no charge. The only complaint is they charge guests for using their business center computers which is unusual. However, the front desk helped me to print a document I needed for my meeting at no charge. Other than that, stayed here for 3 nights and very pleased. A top notch property!
Manager Response: Dear Milkyway5569,  Thank you for taking the time to comment about on your stay at the Quality Suites John Wayne Airport.  We are glad to see that you enjoyed the breakfast and that the front desk assisted you with printing your documents.  I do apologize for the internet not being free of charge.  Fortunately, we will be providing a free internet station by the end of April.  Once again thank you for commenting on your stay and hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: I will be definitely back to this hotel next time when visiting Souther California
Summary: Very nice hotel. Far exceed my expectation. Nice, clean, quiet and comfortable room, great breakfast and very accommodating staff. Love the beautiful ground. Very inviting pool area. Well kept property definitely worth the money.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Affordable, Convenient to the Airport, Helpful Staff
Summary: This is the second time I've stayed at this property and was more pleased this time than last.  Airport pick-up was prompt and the desk staff was congenial.  The room was fine--two parts, one with a desk, couch, TV, and refrigerator and the other with a bed, sink, and closet.  Everything was clean and comfortable.  There are no internal hallways; all rooms open onto external walkways that overlook well-kept grounds.  The free breakfast was made-to-order and tasty.  There's only one restaurant within walking distance of the hotel, so that is a negative, but they give a 10% discount to hotel guests and the food isn't bad.  My only complaint about the hotel is that they have an annoying policy of adding $1.50  charge (okay, it's minimal) to your bill upon check in for each day (I
Manager Response: Dear JSC Traveler, Thank you for taking time to comment about your most recent stay.  We are delighted to see that you are a repeat customer and enjoyed your stay again.  I do apologize for the safe charges automatically posting to your account but unfortunately this is the only way our property can account for the usage of the in room safes.  Once again, I do apologize and hope to see you in the future.

Summary: I made the reservation in this hotel mainly because they had a complimentary shuttle from the airport to the hotel. I was very disappointed when the shuttle could not pick me  up. I had to take a taxi,
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing Quality Suites John Wayne Airport. Quality Suites has airport  shuttle daily from 6:00 AM to 11:00 PM like every other hotels near the airport. I am very sorry the shuttle is not available out of this time periord. Thank you again for choosing Quality Suites.

Summary: My husband is away on business so he came down to celebrate an early V-day with me. We choice this hotel because the suite had a firplace and whirlpool tub. First, the fireplace didn't work (fire marshall shut it down) they didn't mention that to me when I reserved the room. Second, I asked for a balcony, so when we checked in my room was on the first floor( NO BALCONY) they didn't bother to call me to let me know that the room I reserved was placed as not working. Third, when I have stayed in other suites the wirlpool tub is big enough to fit 2 people this one was very small the same size as my tub at home. My husband and I are not at all big I'm 5'2 and about 130lb he's 5'7 and 210lb and we really didn't fit. We then thought that maybe a dip in the jacuzz would be nice, but
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for choosing Quality Suites John Wayne Airport for your special occasion. I am very sorry to know your were disappointed. Quality Suites has three jacuzzi suites, one on each floor. Due to valentine day, all three suites were reserved on that Saturday. We knew you requested a jucuzzi suite with a bacony. I apologized we could not accommodate your request because the other two suites were already occupied by other guests who checked into our hotel before you did. Otherwise, we would love to assign you a suite with a bacony. On our website we have posted a picture of the jacuzzi suite with the bath tub so our guest can see the size of the jacuzzi. I am very sorry it did not work out for you. As far as the fireplace, all we need to do is to turn on a safety shutoff valve out side your room. If you had brought this to our attention during your stay,  our maintenance staff would be more than happy to turn the fireplace on for you. As far as the credit card hold, Quality Suites's policy is to authorize the total room charge ($149.99)and 11% tax plus $100 and 10% of room charge for incidental at check in. The authorization for incidental automatically get released at check out.  Again, I am very sorry for the inconvenice you have experienced during your recent stay and thank you again for choosing Quality Suites.

Summary Heading: Descent Hotel with great breakfast and nice room
Summary: I stayed at this hotel several times. Always enjoy.  I choose this hotel when travelling to OC for its value. It is never a 5 star hotel, but the hotel room is very comfortable,  clean and well equipped with everything you need. Love the cooked to order breakfast. Free internet is easy to use, fast and reliable. Staff is very helpful and knowledgeable. You will need a car if you decide to stay here, otherwise there are no place to go in the immediate vicinity. Overall, a very nice hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for choosing Quality Suites for your business travel need. At Quality Suites, we appreicate your business and thank you for writing a review regarding your recent stay at our hotel. We are glad to know you enjoyed your recent stay.  We would like to welcome you back in the future. At Quality Suites, we are committed  to consistently improving our guest accomodation and guest experience for our valuable guests like yourself. Again, thank you for choosing Quality Suites.

Summary: This hotel offers a great free breakfast, large rooms, and ample free parking, while convenient to John Wayne Airport and Disneyland. All for a very low price. We had stayed here before and came back, because we appreciated the value of the hotel. However, on our last stay we had a disturbing experience. We stayed for six nights, and after the fourth night we had a new maid cleaning the room, and after the fourth and fifth night one toy disappeared. We searched the entire room for the toys, even though we knew where we had left them before in the morning. I complained to management and they said that they would talk to housekeeping, but they did not follow up with us. While the cost of the stolen toys was only $15, which is still cheaper than staying at a more expensive hotel,
Manager Response: Dear DisneyFanVienna,  Thank you for staying with us and taking time out of your busy day to comment about your stay at the Quality Suites John Wayne Airport. I do apologize for the unpleasant experience during your stay. I spoke with the Executive Housekeeper and she stated that the housekeeper did not remove any items from the room. The hotel housekeeping staff is trained not to touch or remove any personal belongings in the room while cleaning the room. The housekeepers who cleaned your room have been with our hotel for over ten years and have never had any issues like this in the past. They are fully aware of the consequence of stealing guest’s belongings and would not risk their job by doing so. According to our past experience, small articles like toys could be misplaced by accident into the trash can that were later covered by papers or something else. When housekeepers clean the room, they dump the trash without the knowledge of the guests' belongings in the trash can. Once again thank you for taking time to write a review and I do apologize for the unpleasant experience.

Summary Heading: Premises smelled and room was dark and dingy.
Summary: We pre-booked 3 nights at this Quality Suites. As I stepped out of the car after driving several hundred miles, I noticed the parking lot had an unpleasant smell. As we were checking in, we realized the lobby had a rather dirty smell, as did the elevator. Although it was mid-afternoon, our room was dingy and dark, even when we turned on the lights. The sofa was old and sank down when we sat on it, and I could feel its frame against my legs. I couldn't imagine staying in that room for even a few more minutes, let alone 3 nights. The desk person said he would refund our money since the hotel did not meet our expectations, but that it would take a few days, which I think is typical for refunds. Fortunately, we found a fine standard room at another hotel quickly as there are several
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a review regarding Quality Suites. What you have described in your review regarding our hotel parking, lobby and room condition does not reflect our hotel image and standard at all. Quality Suites completed its renovation of the entire hotel including parking lot, exterior, lobby, retaurant and every guest suites in 2008. It is hard to imagine our hotel would deteriorate to a condition as you described within two years. Besides, we have reviewed our records of the last 90 days, we did not find any dissatisfied guests as you described who checked out of our hotel with refund due to  the room condition. Quality Suites is located on a hotel circle with seven other hotels on the same block. I will totally understand if you confused our hotel with another hotel.

Summary Heading: Traveling to this area -- this is the place to stay for value.
Summary: I travel to this area weekly on business and have made this my home away from home.  The staff is friendly and helpful, the rooms are spacious and clean, the area is quiet and the management bends over backwards to help.  Either on business or pleasure, this is the best value in the area.  I travel globally over 100 days a year.  One of my top 3 values.
Manager Response: Dear JTMoorpark,  Thank you for taking the time to comment about your stays at the Quality Suites John Wayne Airport.  We always appreciate guests commenting on their stays.  I am pleased to see that you enjoy our accommodations and staff.  We always strive to provide the best service possible.  Once again, thank you for your kind comments and we hope to see you in the near future.

Summary Heading: Very comfortable, clean, and quiet stay
Summary: We have not stayed at many Quality Inns/Suites over the years primarily because those we had frequented were not up to our standards. However, this establishment was a "breath of fresh air" as concerns comfort, price, cleanliness and convenience. The grounds were manicured, lobby and rooms clean/quiet, and beds comfortable. The "made to order" breakfast was tasty, and quickly prepared. The breakfast "chef ladies" deserve a star! We were very comfortable in the suite style rooms and in the clean, newly renovated bath area. Considering the very modest price we paid during our stay (over the Thanksgiving holiday) and for the value received, I would consider this place a winner. Although the rooms do provide free WiFi internet connections, if you do not have your computer with you,
Manager Response: Dear CWWTucson,  Thank you for taking time to write about your stay at the Quality Suites John Wayne Airport.  We are happy to see that the hotel met and surpassed your expectations during your stay.  I do apologize for the inconvenience of a pay for use business center.  Fortunately, we are in the process of getting a new business center that will be free for all guests. Once again, thank you for writing a review and we hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: It's all about getting your money
Summary: We came to Huntington Beach for a Softball tournament at the beginning of November.  The rooms were average. Cleanliness wasn't at the top of the list. However the rates were reasonable at $99.00 per night for our team's stay. Please understand that I don't make the reservations, I stay where the team stays. We were scheduled for another Tournament in November and the team reserved the same hotel. Naturally I decided to take a room with the team. After getting the weather forecast for the upcoming weekend I learned that there was a 90 percent chance of rain. I called the hotel the day before and asked them to cancel my room as It would be a huge finacial burden for me to go through the expense of  flying in to Orange County only to have all the games cancelled. The representiive
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking your time to write a review regarding Quality Suites John Wayne Airport. As a team member of a tournament,  I am sure  you are aware of the hotel cancellation policy.   Due to the hotel's commitment to reserve rooms for your team at a discount price,  Quality suites has a 72 hours cancellation policy which is stated in the contract signed by your team. Like every other hotel, Quality Suites would be glad to waive the cancellation policy if the cancellation is due to a death in the family, sickness or accident.

Summary Heading: Close enough to Disney Parks & airport, much less hectic
Summary: This hotel is in a small "enclave" of mostly suite hotels ("Hotel Terrace") in a light industrial area of Santa Ana, a very short drive to the Orange County/John Wayne Airport and 10-15 minutes to Disneyland Parks.  I mention that because if you have ever stayed near Disneyland, you know the room rates are high for the size and quality of the room you get (paying for proximity).       We stayed in an extremely reasonably-priced 2-room suite, quiet and comfortable.  Excellent room for doing business.  Breakfast is made-to order by the most amazingly efficient ladies in the Cabana Room breakfast area - entertaining to watch! The outdoor courtyard by the pool is a nice place to relax.      This place is nice - not perfect. While the wi-fi internet in the room was serviceable (not
Manager Response: Dear guests,  Thank you for taking your time to write a review regarding your recent stay at Quality Suites John Wayne Airport. At Quality Suites we appreciate your business and would like to welcome you back in the future.

Summary Heading: Nice room, comfortable bed, outstanding service and great breakfast!
Summary: I  can be difficult to satisfy and was a bit anxious about staying in a 3 diamond hotel. Plus, I ws unfamiliar with the locale. This place was impressively maintained and very comfotable. The room was very nice and spacious. The bed was extremely  comfortable. The staff was very friendly and accomodating. The breakfast is very tasty with many choices. The hotel is located in a quiet and safe neighborhood with other hotels and office buildings on the  same street. The nearest shopping center is about 2 miles away with many restaurants, shops and an AMC theater.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for staying at Quality Suites John Wayn Airport.  We appreciated that  you spared your time to write us a review. We are glad to know that you enjoyed your stay with us. At  Quality Suites we strive to provide the best hotel experience for our valuable guests by consistently impoving our guest service, room condition, room cleanliness, and room comfort. Again, we want to  thank you for staying with us and hope you will be back soon.

Summary: The Mangement Was Horrible, And The Room Was Dirty And Wet From Some Else On Top, Spilling Water In To Our Room, Management Did Not Care, And made It Worst, I Do Not Recommened Anyone Staying There!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking your time to write a review regarding your recent stay at Quality Suites John Wayne Airport.  Please accept my sincere apology that Quality Suites did not meet your expectation.  On 10/9/10 at 4:30 PM, you and your partner checked into Room 148, a jacuzzi suite. Around 8:00 PM you called the front desk complained a leak from the bathroom ceiling. The front desk agent immediately sent the maintenance staff to inspect the leak. It turned out the guest in Room 248, which is another jacuzzi suite above Room 148,  let the water overflow from the tub. The maintenance crew stopped the water and dried the bath floor in room 248.  The front desk agent and the maintenance guy advised the guest in Room 248 to respect the hotel rule not to allow water overflow. This rule is posted by a sign next to  the tub in each jacuzzi suite. Around 8:30 PM, you decided to leave the hotel and did not want to get charged for using the room before the front desk agent had an opportunity to move you to a third floor jacuzzi suite. At Quality Suites, customer satisfaction is our top priority. We do care about our guest during their stay at our hotel. Again, I want to apologize for the inconvenience.

Summary: The suites were large and comfortable but are crying to be remodeled. The furniture and decor outdated but resonably priced. Staff very friendly and courtious.
Manager Response: Dear Kharmannghia, Thank you for taking time to write a comment about your stay at the Quality Suites.  We are pleased to see that you had a comfortable stay during your visit to Santa Ana.  Again, I would like thank you for taking the time to comment about your stay and we hope to see you soon.

Summary: Stayed at the property for 2 nights in Oct. 2010. The hotel staff was very friendly and helpful. The hotel is close to the John Wayne Airport, however, it is very quite. The property is well maintained. We had an issue with the plumbing and the maintenance staff was very quick to respond and fix the issue. The rooms were clean but the decor is very 1970ish. The breakfast area was very clean. The breakfast itself was very good, many choices and tasty. Would not hesitate to stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Dear Zebrasky,  Thank you for writing a review of your stay. We greatly appreciate the kind comments about the Quality Suites John Wayne Airport.  I apologize for the inconvenience you had with the plumbing issue and I am glad to hear that our staff took care of the issue in a timely matter. Once again, thank you for taking time to write a review.

Summary Heading: thank you for a wonderful stay
Summary: The hotel does not look brand new from the outside but was very surprised at how clean, new, modern and comfortable the room was.  The room has wonderful amenities.  The staff was very friendly, helpful and seemed to enjoy working for the company.  The grounds were absolutely beautiful and the hotel is very well maintained.  Great breakfast! Everything was top-notch.  Even if I had paid the "going rate" for this room, I still would have been very satisfied and felt it was worth it!
Manager Response: Dear Jcole447,  Thank you for taking time to comment about your stay during your visit to Orange County.  We are delighted to see that you enjoyed your stay and appreciate the kind comments about our hotel.  Once again, thank you for taking time to comment about your stay and we hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Great location and immaculate hotel and room.  Recommended!
Summary: We stayed here with two children (5&7) in a two bed suite.  Great room with separating door for parent quiet time.  Breakfast was excellent and made fresh to order.  Parking was free and right off the 55 HWY.  Excellent for quick trips to the Newport Beach.  Everything was very clean.  Only complaint was the treadmill in the exercise room didn't work.  Already planning our next stay.  One of the nicer hotels for the area with free Wi-Fi.
Manager Response: Dear Princes4me2,  Thank for writing a review about your stay at the Quality Suites John Wayne Airport.  We are happy to see that the hotel met most of your needs during your stay.  We do apologize for the treadmill not working.  Unfortunately, during your stay we had to repair the treadmill due to a mechanical malfunction. Once again, I do apologize for that inconvenience. (The hotel was provided by the safe deposit box manufacturer with ONLY one key for each box and the only key (a special flat key) can NOT be duplicated. So if a key was  lost, the hotel will  have to drill into the deposit box. For this reason, our hotel asks for a refundable $25 key deposit). To open a safe deposit box, it requires two keys - one is so called the 'master guard key' that is kept by the hotel and the other key which is unique to each box is kept by the guest who uses the box. Since the hotel does not have the safe deposit key that is kept by the guest, no one can open a safe deposit box with only the master guard key.   After you reported that your money was stolen, the hotel manager advised you to report this incident  to the local police. After reviewed  the video camera tape, the police found no evidence of theft from the hotel employee. The video tape and hotel records revealed  that another person who stayed with you had accessed the box without your presence prior to your report of money stealing. According to the police, you told the police that you had taken $300 from the box  in three $100 bills. The video showed you had taken seven bills. After the police left, you approached the hotel manager asked for comp room or a discount. The hotel was not able to give you a discount nor a comp room because the hotel  was not at fault. The next day, you asked for early check out. Since you accepted the hotel early check out policy at check in by endorsing the registration card that discloses the hotel early check out policy, the hotel was not able to accommodate your request.  You also wanted to cancel your  other reservation which carries a no cancellation condition due to its discount rate. However, the hotel went ahead to cancel your other reservation.  The $25 deposit was refunded after you returned the key.   I am very sorry this very unpleasant experience had happened during your stay with us.
